import { memo, useState } from 'react' import { Rating } from 'react-simple-star-rating' import { BsArrowRight } from 'react-icons/bs' import Select from 'react-select'; import './RegisterInformationAccomodation.scss' function RegisterInformationAccomodation({ languageSelected, setSelectedOption, handleClickSaveAndNext, accomodationData, setAccomodationData }) { const handleBlur = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #D9D9D9' } const handleFocus = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } const [rating, setRating] = useState(0) const handleRating = (rate) => { setRating(rate) } const handleInputPropertyName = (value) => { let newDataForm = accomodationData newDataForm.propertyName = value setAccomodationData(newDataForm) } const handleInputStatus = (value) => { let newDataForm = accomodationData newDataForm.status = value setAccomodationData(newDataForm) } const optionsStatus = [ { value: 1, label: 'Active' }, { value: 2, label: 'Close' }, { value: 3, label: 'Pause' } ] const handleInputNumberOfFloors = (value) => { let newDataForm = accomodationData newDataForm.numberOfFloors = value console.log(newDataForm.numberOfFloors) setAccomodationData(newDataForm) } return (
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} onChange={(e) => handleInputPropertyName(e.target.value)} />
handleInputNumberOfFloors(e.target.value)} onFocus={(e) => handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='address' className="input-inline" type='text' />
